Issue.creator: latitiah
Issue.summary: CI Failures: Daily test suite for v1.2
Issue.description: DEBU 001 Found map string interface{} value for peer.BCCSP{code} The missing chaincode text now says {code:java} chaincode myex02_b not found{code} These failures can be seen in the console: https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-test/job/fabric-test-svt-x86_64/86/consoleFull This issue was found becauseÂ the jenkins plugin was not able to read the output that was written to the test result xml files. >
